p: The ability of essential oils to inhibit lipid peroxidation was explored by using the β-carotene bleaching test as previously reported [ 15]. Essential oils concentrations in the range of 6.25–100 μg/mL were tested. Measurements were carried out at initial time ( t = 0 min), and after 30 and 60 min of incubation. Propyl gallate was used as a positive control.
